question: 貼る
sourceAnswer: to{}{stick/paste/affix} | to:{stretch/spread/strain/tighten/put-up-(tent)} | to:form-(e.g.-ice-on-a-pond) | to:{fill/swell} | to{}{stick-out/put/slap} | to{}post-(a-link,-etc.-online) | to-be:expensive | to{}{keep-a-watch-on/be-on-the-lookout} | to:become-one-tile-away-from-completion | to{}{span/generate}
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>paste</kanji> so the verb vocab is <vocabulary>to paste</vocabulary> (or <vocabulary>to stick</vocabulary>).
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned with the kanji.
